thread.title: Italy’s Elites Are Anxious as Election Nears

author: Simon Nixon
title: Italy’s Elites Are Anxious as Election Nears
text:
The problem with Italy was first identified by Massimo d’Azeglio, one of its first statesmen, in 1861: “we have made Italy, now we must make Italians.”
It was acknowledgment that reunification of the peninsula had been an elite project rather than the result of a surge of nationalist enthusiasm among the diverse people who were to be reunited. 

Newly-minted...
